Product Description

【RGB Illuminated Keyboard】The mechanical keyboard features key backlight. There are 15 lighting effect modes; 5 backlight brightness levels;5 Adjustable breathing speeds.
【N-Key Rollover & Programmable】The PC gaming keyboard is with fully conflict-free 61 keys that ensures the accuracy for simultaneous key presses during intense gameplay and fast typing.
【Multiple Functions & Wide Compatibility】The computer keyboard also has multimedia key combinations and Win-Lock function for efficiently gaming or working. Plug & play, no need driver. Compatible with Windows,MacOS,Linus,Android.
Faster Than Traditional Mechanical Switches: Gateron Optical switch technology uses optical beam-based actuation, registering key presses at the speed of light (15-30% shorter actuation distance than other linear switches at 1.0 millimeter)

item.title: Fossil Men’s Townsman Stainless Steel Mechanical Automatic Watch
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Each of our Fossil mens’ watches are built to last and embody the bold, creative spirit of their wearers. Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $250.00 - $140.63
(as of Nov 29,2022 09:20:02 UTC – Details)


Each of our Fossil mens’ watches are built to last and embody the bold, creative spirit of their wearers. Through quality craftsmanship, premium features and a keen attention to detail, our watches are made for the everyday-wearer, the adventurer and everyone in between.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 1.73 x 0.87 x 0.47 inches; 0.02 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ME3098
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Metal batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 18, 2015
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Fossil Watches
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01487C7CO

Transparently cool-Townsman reveals the inner workings of the watch with a innovative see-through dial. Whether dressing for the office or weekend, this timepiece has the mark of distinction
Case size: 44mm; Band size: 22mm; automatic mechanical movement with analog display; skeleton dial reveals the intricate, hand-assembled inner workings of the watch; self-winding; hardened mineral crystal lens resists scratches; imported
Black stainless steel case with black dial; genuine brown leather band with adjustable buckle closure; interchangeable with all 22mm Fossil watch straps
Water resistant to 50m (165ft): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling; 5 ATM
An automatic—or self-winding—watch is a mechanical timepiece in which the mainspring is wound automatically from the natural motion of the wearer’s arm. This provides energy to run the watch, making manual winding and a battery unnecessary

OUR STORY

FOSSIL WAS INSPIRED BY AMERICAN CREATIVITY AND INGENUITY

Bringing new life into the watch industry by making quality, fashionable watches that were both fun and accessible. Creativity was at the heart of everything we did.


DESIGN FEATURES

WHAT MAKES US, US

OUR PRODUCT

Our collections celebrate our love for all things vintage with a nod to mid-century design. Our elevated ethos takes root in each and every style.

OUR SUCCESS RECIPE

Optimism, authenticity and, of course, our creative spirit. Everything we make complements every style and fits every lifestyle.

OUR TINSPIRATION

What if a package could communicate the soul of a brand? Our famous tins came to embody our young, fun, authentic brand and creative culture.

SEND A MESSAGE

It only takes a few letters to make a piece personal. Plus: It’s free*. *Available at participating Fossil stores.

MEET OUR COLLECTIONS

Previous page

  1. FOSSIL BLUE

    This collection debuts with four new bands: rich leather, sportier silicone, classic solid steel bracelet and stainless steel mesh bracelet that’s inspired by shark-proof chainmail dive suits.

    SEE NOW

  2. INSCRIPTION

    The square-shaped case was a turning point in watchmaking history. What’s old is new again—this archival Inscription watch is upgraded with a two-layered dial and exposed screws on its topring.

    SEE NOW

  3. BRONSON

    This rugged watch embodies a pioneering spirit. With bold, easy-read indices and luminescent accents, its oversized dial makes it an ideal timepiece for day or night.

    SEE NOW

  4. NEUTRA CHRONOGRAPH

    Refined and versatile, it’s made to be dressed up or dressed down.

    SEE NOW

  5. TOWNSMAN AUTOMATIC

    The skeleton dial on this 1950s-inspired timepiece reveals the intricate, hand-assembled inner workings. The mainspring is wound automatically from the motion of the wearer’s arm—no battery needed.

    SEE NOW

Next page

TIME FOR CHANGE

DESIGN FOR THE FUTURE

Design and produce 100% of our products to meet our pro-planet criteria by 2025.

PRO-PLANET PACKAGING

Make 100% of our primary packaging recyclable and/or reusable by 2025.

REDUCE OUR FOOTPRINT

Reduce water consumption for leather tanning by 45% by 2025. Reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 30% by 2030.

2025 GOAL

Lead in circular business model approaches—where our materials can be used, reused and reduced—by 2025.

4.5

(as of Nov 29,2022 09:20:02 UTC – Details)

These trees are hand selected by our expert craftsmen to ensure the exceptional quality of our wooden wrist watches.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99 - $17.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:52:55 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Water-resistant Compatible with Windows and Mac OS

104 keys US layout keyboard which can prevent damage from spilled drinks or coffee. The designed also keep your keyboard durable and waterproof.”

2-in-1 Keyboard for Gaming or Typing

A keyboard is a must-have tool for anyone who spends many hours typing to do office work every day. So backlit keyboards are designed for the gamer, office worker, copywriter, programmer, typing teacher, and editors.

Lock WIN key to enter game mode

Use FN + WIN keys to turn off the LED keyboard win key to enter the game mode, no longer need to worry about intense game touch win key pop-up start menu bar and lead to screen lag

Friendly Tips

1 Mechanical feel gaming keyboard is not a real mechanical keyboard, but the feel is similar to mechanical keyboard and less noise than mechanical keyboard, suitable for people who need office and game.If you need a real mechanical keyboard, please consider before ordering.

2. The LED of wired backlit keyboard has three colors: red, blue and purple. Press the backlight button to switch between single colors.Due to the differences between versions, if you receive a keyboard without backlit keys, you can use FN+Scroll Look to switch the backlight colour.

We advocate using a simple monochrome keyboard to help you improve your focus in office and gaming. If you need a rainbow breathing keyboard, please consider before ordering.

3.DBpower gaming keyboard product service: 12 months.

4.What’s inside the box? 1*DBpower mechanical feel gaming office 2-in-1 keyboard,1*User’s manual”

【3-Color RGB LED Backlight】Backlit keyboard have 3 Backlight modes providing you immersing gaming experience. Adjustable 23 level brightness meets different needs. You can customize your own backlit keyboard through adjusting the brightness and breathing speed of the backlit. Better enjoy the fun of the game.
【100% Anti-ghosting】Gaming Keyboard made of solid Metal Frame，No fading, more wear-resistant, avoiding the trouble of fading characters.104-key Gaming Keyboard, 19 Non-Conflict Keys, Removable Keycaps, Strengthened Space Key. Specially designed keys for enhanced durability and tactile feedback offers a professional gaming feeling，Give you a greater advantage in the competition.
【12 Function Hotkey Design】Mechanical keyboard features 12 easy-to-reach function keys for multimedia control of video and music, email, and more. Ideal for entertainment, teaching, and office, saving you time and making work and life easier. Convenient and worry-free .This keyboard suitable for families, offices, and travel.
【Ergonomic Design Keyboard 】The design of the pc keyboard accords with ergonomics, is not tired after long-term use, and provides you with the comfort needed for a marathon. The splash-proof feature prevents the internal components of the pc gaming keyboard from being damaged by accidental spills of coffee or water. Effectively prolong the service life, easy to clean.
【Sensitive&Wide Compatibility 】Wired Gaming Keyboard strokes are light and stress-free, and the rebound speed is fast .keyboard combination is very durable and compatible with Windows 2000 / ME / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10. The Wired Keyboard suitable for desktops, Chrome books, PCs, laptops, computers, smart TVs

Read more
